highlights_en:
• AI and STEM Focus: Courses and workshops at top Singaporean institutions like Nanyang Technological University and the Science Centre Singapore.

• Cultural Exploration: Visit iconic sites such as Merlion Park, Gardens by the Bay, and Jewel Changi Airport.

• Hands-On Learning: Participate in environmental demonstrations and STEM courses with practical applications.

• Social Activities: Engage in group work and team-building exercises to foster collaboration and friendship.

• Expert Guidance: Learn from experienced educators and industry professionals to gain insights into the future of STEM and AI.
highlights_zh:
• AI与STEM重点：在新加坡南洋理工大学和科学中心等顶级机构进行课程和工作坊。

• 文化探索：参观鱼尾狮公园、滨海花园和樟宜机场等标志性景点。

• 实践学习：参与环保演示和具有实际应用的STEM课程。

• 社交活动：参与小组作业和团队建设练习，促进合作与友谊。

• 专家指导：向经验丰富的教育工作者和行业专业人士学习，深入了解STEM和AI的未来。

overview_en: The Singapore Science and Innovation STEM Summer Camp is a 7-day program designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This camp offers a unique opportunity to explore cutting-edge technology through hands-on practice, interactive workshops, and visits to iconic institutions like the Singapore Science Centre and Nanyang Technological University (NTU). Participants will engage in STEM projects, learn about artificial intelligence and environmental sustainability, and experience Singapore's rich cultural heritage while enjoying world-class attractions such as Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios Singapore.
overview_zh: 新加坡科学与创新STEM夏令营是一个为期7天的项目，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该夏令营为学生提供了一个独特的机会，通过动手实践、互动工作坊以及参观新加坡科学馆和南洋理工大学（NTU）等标志性机构，探索新加坡的前沿科技。参与者将参与STEM项目，学习人工智能与环境可持续发展的知识，并体验新加坡丰富的文化遗产，同时还能享受滨海湾花园和新加坡环球影城等世界级景点的乐趣。
